text: DEFCON or Defense Readiness Condition is an alert state used by the United States Army. It also indicates how severe a threat could be. DEFCON can be separated into 5 categories, 5 being average everyday life and 1 being the most ready. The table below shows the varying levels of readiness. Levels of DEFCON Readiness Condition Exercise Term Description Readiness DEFCON 1 COCKED PISTOL Nuclear war is very soon or has already started The most readiness, response happens right now DEFCON 2 FAST PACE Near nuclear war Army ready in less than 6 hours DEFCON 3 ROUND HOUSE Heightened readiness Air Force prepared in 15 minutes DEFCON 4 DOUBLE TAKE Increased watching and stronger security Above regular readiness DEFCON 5 FADE OUT Lowest state of readiness Normal readiness. Category:United States Army The U.S has only reached DEFCON 2 once during the Cuban Missile Crisis.
title: DEFCON
